page.title: 04Annual Parish Meeting 1985
page.content: The Annual Parish Meeting was held on Monday, 24th April. It was interesting and informative, the accounts were presented by the treasurer and explained that the public had its chance to question the Council. Unfortunately only 26 people were there and if one considers that half that number was the council, it was a very poor turn out! There is always something happening in Elsenham as far as the Parish Council are concerned and 1984 was no exception. Vandalism, footway lighting, the War Memorial, the proposed new building on the playing field and local development were some of the main subjects covered by the chairman in his address - something for everyone, one would have thought. Last month the Parish Council commented on the poor attendance at
